MS MCQs

    Get started with Microsoft Dataverse for Teams

    »

    1. What is required for creating a table in Dataverse for Teams?

      A table can’t be created until you have a Dataverse for Teams license.

      A table can’t be created until the Dataverse for Teams environment is provisioned when you are creating a new app or chatbot.

      A table can’t be created until a Power Apps tab is added to a channel.

      A table can’t be created until a Power Automate cloud flow has been associated with a Power Apps application.


    2. Guest users who have access to your team need the ability to create, modify, and delete records within your table. However, the guest users should not be able to see records that were created by other users because they are not members of your company. Which level of privilege should they be assigned in the Management interface?

      Full access

      Collaborative

      Reference

      Private

      None


    3. Which editor gives you access to all available data types when you are creating a new column in a Dataverse for Teams table?

      Dataverse for Teams table editor

      Power Apps visual table editor

      SharePoint list editor

      Power Apps table editor
